name: sjd-core
description: Boilerplate theme for all new WP Themes made by Sam Davis

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:scss
scripts.build:js: browserify src/js/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --sourceMaps true  ] -d | exorcist dist/js/app.js.map > dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs --compress warnings=false --mangle --in-source-map dist/js/app.js.map --source-map-url app-min.js.map --source-map dist/js/app-min.js.map -- dist/js/app.js > dist/js/app-min.js

author: Sam Davis <sam@sjd.co>
